name: AsCode Woo Load Calculator – Build Load Calculator for Eletronics Woocommerce Shop & Help Customer to Suggest Product
author: Osman Haider Adnan

sections.description:
Now, you can build calculator with unlimited fields for your Energy supply shop to calculate energy and put short-code anywhere of your website.

Customer can calculate load easily and they will get a suggestion of similer porduct.

Now, let’s see a quick overview of our Load calculator plugin:

Features:

[Build Calculator:] Build Calculator of your own filed name and field value.

[Shortcode:] Put short-code anywhere, such as post or page.

[Calculaton:] Calculate by quentity easily

[Product Suggestion:] Customer can get product suggestion based on customers calculation.

[Enable/Disable price and Add to cart:] User can enable or disable Add to cart button and price.
sections.installation:
Modern Way:

  1. Go to the WordPress Dashboard “Add New Plugin” section.
  2. Search For “AsCode Woo Calculator”.
  3. Install, then Activate it.

Old Way:

  1. Upload AsCode Woo Calculator to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Does it work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, it will work with any standard WordPress theme.
sections.changelog:
1.1.5 – 3rd April 2024

  • Tweak: WordPress 6.5 compatibility checked.
  • Fix: Calculator mobile responsive css issue.

1.1.4 – 26th March 2024

  • Fix: Calculator mobile responsive issue fix.

1.1.2 – 13th March 2024

  • Fix: Calculator saved with empty name.

1.1.1 – 12th March 2024

  • New: Settings for show price.
  • Fix: Few minor issue.

1.1.0 – 11th March 2024

  • New: Settings for add to cart button.
  • New: Go to single product page added.
  • Fix: Exact product not found issue.
  • Fix: Undefine product issue.

1.0.1 – 18th November 2023

  • Initial stable release.

1.0.0-beta – 15th November 2023

  • Initial beta release.
